lead_paragraph: Several films this season - including "The Social Network" and the coming "All Good Things" - portray living people. And in the case of these two movies, people have criticized how some of the central figures in these stories are represented on film. If a movie were to be made about you, whom would you cast to play you? Why?
snippet: Student Opinion | Tell us whom you would cast to play you, as well as close family members and friends, in a movie version of your life. Would you base the decision on appearance alone, or also on personality, mannerisms and other factors?

headline.main: Whom Would You Cast to Play You in a Movie?

abstract: Student Opinion | Tell us whom you would cast to play you, as well as close family members and friends, in a movie version of your life. Would you base the decision on appearance alone, or also on personality, mannerisms and other factors?
